title: D/Cing  for fora quick second randomly
body: I keep every so often through games D/Cing for like half a second. However there is no ping spike and this only happens with league. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Hey Ethical, 

You may want to try Riots Connection KB just in case it turns into a bigger problem later down the road. 

*Connection KB*: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Hope this helps ya out! 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
